title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 13.3 - Designation of hearing officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 13.3 - Designation of hearing officer

State Regulations
(a) The
designation of a hearing officer shall be made by the Commissioner of Economic

Development in writing and filed with the Department of Economic

Development. (b) Upon being
notified that a hearing officer declines or fails to serve, or in the case of
death, resignation or removal of a hearing officer, a successor hearing officer
shall be designated by the Commissioner of Economic Development to continue the
proceeding. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
13.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
